column1: Art Institute of Chicago////The Art Institute is a definite must-visit museum in Chicago. I consider it easily top three among all the ones I've been to in New York
column4: and DC.  Three floors with multiple buildings (which connect ONLY on the first floor) full of art from all over the world.  I especially like the brightly-lit interior
column6: and very-comfortable air conditioning.  They also offer free WIFI
column8: and some decent grub too.  You can easily spend a day here and still not see everything.
